PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-06362021-06-2427-2018,  LAB,  JUS,  PPC,  PTB,  ,  ,  , 
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2018, No. 2
SubjectOrder Fixing August 31, 2021 as the Day on Which Certain Sections and Subsections of that Act Come into Force
PrecisOrder fixing August 31, 2021 as the day on which the Pay Equity Act, Part II.1 (Pay Equity) of the Parliamentary Employment and Staff Relations Act (PERSA) and all necessary related, transitional and consequential amendments to the Canadian Human Rights Act (CHRA) and Budget Implementation Act, 2009 (BIA 2009) COME INTO FORCE.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2021-0036 Publication Date: 2021-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Fixing August 31, 2021 as the Day on Which Certain Sections and Subsections of that Act Come into Force
precis: Order fixing August 31, 2021 as the day on which the Pay Equity Act, Part II.1 (Pay Equity) of the Parliamentary Employment and Staff Relations Act (PERSA) and all necessary related, transitional and consequential amendments to the Canadian Human Rights Act (CHRA) and Budget Implementation Act, 2009 (BIA 2009) COME INTO FORCE.
